metadata.description: The World of Tom Clancy's The Division is the meticulously crafted result of a partnership between Dark Horse books and Ubisoft Entertainment, offering readers a unique insight into the chaotic and dangerous world of the hit games. Don't miss this opportunity to learn all there is to know about the tactical methods, the high-tech tools, and the all-important mission of the Division! 192 pages of art and lore from the universe of Tom Clancy's The Division and its hotly anticipated sequel! Created in intimate collaboration with the developers of the game!
metadata.name: Tom Clancy's The Division: Extremis Malis
